name: Rollator Walker with seat (Foldable)
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm L, resides alone in a one-room rental unit. Her mobility is deteriorating as she ages and she require a suitable mobility aid to help to continue to ambulate independently.

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a rollator walker with seat (foldable) to support her while she moves around in the community. 

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please Whatsapp Case Manager Xin Yi at 8292 2214. We appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Jalan Kukoh. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Wheelchair
description: Client releasing from Prison but with mobility issues. Requires a wheelchair to move about at ease. Unable to purchase one and will need it upon his release.

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Service - Family Resource Centre
contact.name: Janet Liam Hui Hui

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Single elderly male who is a stroke survivor with left side contractures of the past 7 years. He lives in a rental flat that has been infested with bed bugs. He is not on good terms with his CO-tenant and relies heavily on his motorised wheelchair to go out of home to avoid conflict at home. He needs to have the motorised wheelchair before fumigation can be done to his flat.

name: Walking frame with wheels
description: Client (F/44) has multiple chronic health conditions and has abdominal pain which limits her mobility and strength. A walking frame with wheels can help her to move around the house more easily to go to the toilet, do simple housekeeping and  to care for her 12y/o son.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Louise Quek

name: Elevating Footrest and Detachable Armrest Wheelchair
description: 8 years old child who was diagnosed with cancer had just undergone a surgery at the leg and requires a wheelchair with detachable armrest and an elevating footrest.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: COVID ART TEST KIT
description: We are appealing FOR A COVID 19 ART TEST KIT for a low income client who need to do ART TEST twice a week due to is part time status his company did not provide him with the kits and he have to fork up his own money to do so due to hs financial constrains is not able to do so

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Standard Q ART Test Kits (50x and more)
description:
For low income families with children ages between 5 - 18 years old.
With more testing require during the current phrase, the low income families are experiencing difficulties in affording more test kits, especially families with many children. Hence, need support in donations of Standard Q ART Test Kits. Donors can get in touch with me on delivering the test kits to our office at (20 Lengkok Bahru, Playground Block, #03-02, Singapore 159053). Thank you!

name: Blood Glucose Meter
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to afford a blood sugar measuring meter to monitor her blood sugar level

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Clementi
contact.name: Gwen Ho

name: Nan Supreme Infant Formula
description: Young family has a 1 year old son and just delivered another baby last month. Children's father is 22 years old and enlisted into NS early this year. Requesting for milk powder support to ease financial strain. Children currently consume Nan Supreme milk powder as children react negatively to other brands. Infant formula required: Stage 1 and State 2.

name: Fridge
description:
Clt and her husband are in their late 50s and have not been able to work due to poor health conditions. Their fridge has broken down for a month and she has not been able to keep their food fresh or cold. A fridge would greatly support clt's ability to cook and provide food for her husband, 5 year old grand daughter and herself.

Email or whatsapp @ 66901010.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Seniors mobile phone
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), requires a seniors mobile phone to stay connected with her family. She had been using her home phone but when she was hospitalized for close to 4 months, her phone line had been cut off by the service provider due to late payment. The telecom has not gotten back to the appeal of reinstating the phone line. The mobile phone will help with the client’s situation as she stays alone and has high fall risk, she will need the phone to call for help if emergency happens.   

    

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a seniors mobile phone.  

    

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Manager Jaslyn at 8292 2216. We appreciate it if the donor could arrange delivery to the beneficiary. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Air Purifier
description: Client has a 4 month old daughter and a 6 year old son. At present she is living with her family in a 2-room rental flat. The area around where she is living has constructions going on as such, dust particles and pollutants have been affecting their breathing and skin condition. Client has psoriasis and eczema and her 5 month old daughter has eczema as well. An air purifier will greatly benefit their quality of life.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: S Maheswari

name: Food item/Groceries
description:
Client and husband are in their 50s with medical conditions. They are a single-income household with 1 grandchild (4 y/o). Client is the primary caregiver to grandson since birth and takes care of husband who is diabetic. Caregiving has been a struggle for client as her daughter has not been present to care for the child (born out of wedlock). They require assistance getting food to reduce their financial stressor. 

SW will provide list of items needed.

name: Sanitizer Spray Gun for low-income family (COVID+)
description: Family of 10 with limited income has been diagnosed with COVID-19. There are 4 young children in the family, and family plans to sanitize the home environment after the entire family is recovered. (Example: https://shopee.sg/%F0%9F%94%A5SG-Ready-Stocks%F0%9F%94%A5-Sanitizer-Spray-Disinfection-Machine-Blue-Ray-Disinfectant-Spray-Gun-UV-Nano-Atomizer-K5-i.263720366.9059674663?sp_atk=bc24fc1b-348d-4385-8728-edcfdf8c9fc1). Interested donor, please contact Shiyan at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you!

name: Household essentials
description:
Christmas hamper collection drive. We are preparing to pack and distribute 40 sets of hampers to stay-alone elderly, or low-income families as part of our year-end festivities. Please contact Jiemei @ 81266854 or Clarissa @ 91271945 for more information.

Items required:
Hand soap
Dishwashing liquid
Dish sponge
Gloves
Dettol wet wipes

name: Mamypoko pants, XXL size, pull up pants
description: Client (38/F) is a mother of 2 children (7/F and 3/M). Client works as a part-time stall assistant in a school canteen and earns an average of $400 a month. Due to strained marital relationship, client's husband does not  contribute  to meet the expenses of the household.  Family struggles to cope financially and has difficulty meeting baby essentials. Client would greatly appreciate the donation of milk and diapers to child until she is able to find full time employment.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: S-26, Gold Pro
description: Client (25/F) is currently unemployed due to caregiving responsibilities for her three children (3/M, 1/F and 5 mth/M). She has stopped working in 2018 to look after C1 due to an accidental neglect of child’s safety under the care of her grandmother, Client's husband is the sole breadwinner. Family struggles to cope financially and has arrears from childcare ($4000). Client would greatly appreciate the donation of milk to her child until she is able find employment.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: TENA adult diaper (size L)
description: 58 year old grandmother suffered stroke several years ago. Client experiences some mobility issues and incontinence, required to be on diapers daily. Her husband is the sole breadwinner, supporting a family of 7.

name: Food Rations
description: A pair of young couple who is currently homeless and having financial difficulty to make ends meet. They would require halal dry food rations to tide through this difficult period.

name: Groceries
description: Family of three with 4-year-old son are facing financial constraints and would require some halal groceries.

name: Food Ration for Needy Family
description: Fresh food items and groceries are needed by the family to alleviate the living expenses. All items need to be halal certified. A) Dry & canned food: Rice - 1 x 5kg, Eggs- 2x dozen eggs, Milo packet drinks -24 packets, White bread- 2 loaves, Nutella- 1 x 900g, Fever Cooling Gel Sheets (Children, brand Salonpas) - 4 packets, UHT Milk (brand:Farmhouse) - 3 packets, Campbell Instant Soup (Cream of Mushroom) - 2 packets, Campbell Instant Soup (Cream of Chicken) - 2 packets, Instant Noodles Maggi (Curry) - 1 packet. B) Fresh:Fruits (banana, red apple, rockmelon, watermelon, mango) – any amount	any fruits any amount. C) Wet/frozen: Chicken nuggets (brnad: freezepak) - 2 x 1kg, Fresh chicken pieces - 2 sets of chicken pieces, Fishball	dodo - 2 packets, Crabsticks - 2 packets. The items will be directly delivered to beneficiary's place and please contact us for delivery details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact: 9436 7401). We appreciate any quantity/item for donation.  Thank you!

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother with 2 young children and she requires a laptop for her children's schoolwork. Client is low income and unable to afford laptop. Kindly contact 83226427 should you wish to donate. Thank you!

name: 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants
description:
Client works part time as a school canteen staff and has multiple dependents at home. She has difficulty meeting the diaper needs of elderly mother and 2 young nephews (2 & 4 years old). 

She requires 3 packets of TENA M size (pull up pants), 3 packets of huggies/drypers XL(pull up pants), and 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants. 

Please respond via email or whatsapp @ 66901010

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula (2-3 bottles)
description:
Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client's income was recently further impacted due to severe eczema experienced that led him to be hospitalized, affecting his ability to maintain employment. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapers. We would like to seek donations for 4 Drypers/Huggies diapers of size XL and 2 Drypers/Huggies diapers of XXL for the two sons in addressing their sanitary needs and Pediasure Milk Formula and Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula for children's development consumption due to family's financial struggles. Your kindness is much appreciated.

Please contact via email or whatsapp @66901010

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

description: We are looking for donation of cartoon balloons and helium to help cheer children in the hospital.

He works as a grab food delivery staff which affect the family financial situation. Wife is not working as she need to take care of the children at home.

description: A family with a toddler staying in their rental flat. Father is working as a delivery rider and his income fluctuates according to the availability of orders. They are tapping on financial support in order to make their ends meet. Father’s electric bicycle is not working and he requires one which is LTA approved to continue support the family. A second-hand one is perfect!

name: Motorised scooter
description: An elderly client is requesting for a motorized scooter as his previous motorized scooter has broken down for a while and he is unable to walk with a steady gait after inserting 10 screws in his back and leg when he fell from the 2nd floor in 1989 when he was working as an aircon electrician. He is permanently unfit for work and requires a motorized scooter to allow him to travel further in place of his wheelchair as he feels very trapped and isolated in his rental unit.

Client is a 32 year old who is the mother of 4 children aged 13 year old, 11 years old, 9 years old and 10 months old. Client's husband is earning low income as a cleaner and is experiencing financial difficulties. Currently, client is living in a rental flat. Client's wife employment was affected due to COVID-19 and resulting in her current unemployment state. Client's wife is current unable to work due to caregiving duties for the infant child. The husband's income is unable to sustain sufficient necessities for his children's needs. The family would need support for the children's necessities and hopes to receive aid for the following: 1. Drypers Wee Wee Dry Diapers - L (9 - 14kg) 3 x 62 per pack (CTN)
2. Frisolac Gold 2 with 2'-FL 900g - Infant Formula (6-12 M)

name: Nestle Modulen IBD Milk Powder
description:
Urgent request for Milk Powder!!!
Client's son (9/M) is recently diagnosed with Chrohn's Disease and has to be on 2 months strict milk powder intake due to infection. The specific brand of milk powder is expensive ($40/tin) and son has to consume 1 tin a day. Due to miscomm with MSW, the milk powder can only be supplied two weeks later and client have run out of savings and need milk powder to last for this two weeks!

name: Washing Machine (top load)
description:
November gaji:
300 (gaji pasal 100 dah bayar advance pat boss) + 300 (Zakat MUIS) = 600
600 – 100 (hutang kawan cik balance 750) = 500
500 – 50 (hutang suami cik balance 450) = 450
450 – 100 (Barang Rumah) = 350
350 – 20 (town council) = 330 
330 – 20 (ez-link suami) = 310 
310 – 60 (ez link cik) = 250
250 – 30 (HP cik) = 220
220 – 10 (HP suami cik) = 210
210 – 50 (SP) = 160

contact.name: Nathania Chua

name: 3 Doors Cupboard
description: Client is a middle aged lady who does not have enough money to buy a 3 door cupboard at home for her things as she is not working currently due to chronic health issues and limited mobility. She is currently on financial assistance, but it is only enough to cover her basic needs and not replace her broken cupboard. It would be very helpful if a donor could donate a new or preloved 3 door cupboard. Feel free to contact me to discuss about the cupboard. Thank you for helping client!

name: Plastic Drawers
description:
We are requesting for a 2 sets of a 4 tier plastic drawers. 
Due to the increasing number of clients, tools (such as aprons) that clients are using will require a bigger and safer way to be kept. In addition, the drawers will help clients to have easy access to their tools for the day.

name: Foldable table
description: A gentleman and his co-tenant require a small foldable table for dining.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: dining table with 4 chairs
description: A single mother of 3 young children who relies on financial assistance to sustain her family, is hoping to have a 4-seater dinning table and a coffee table for the family.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Double-decker bed
description: Grandmother and granddaughter staying together.  Grandmother is elderly and visually impaired.  Granddaughter is unable to work due to health reason.   Family needs a double decker bed as the old one broken.  Donor, pls look for worker Christopher

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Double decker bunk beds (2x)
description: Family of 6 with 4 children (age 14, 12, 10, 10) living in a 4-room flat. Family were previously Malaysia citizens and paying full unsubsidized school fees, hence their house furnitures were very old/ donated/ taken from recycling site. Requesting for double decker bunk beds for the children so as to give them some personal space. Appreciate delivery to be send to client house. Thank you!

name: Daybed
description:
Client is a single mother with 3 children, aged 27,  21 and 15. 
Suriani is diagnosed with Diabetes and is wheelchair-bound. 
As such, there is a no breadwinner of the family as Suriani is going through a divorce and she is unable to rely on her eldest daughter for support since her eldest daughter has her own financial commitments. 
She survives her daily living highly on financial assistance and neighbors’ support. 
Her current day bed is broken and she would require a new day bed to support her current mattress so that she is able to sleep well.

name: King-sized Mattress
description: Family consists of a single mother living with 4 children and 2 grandchildren in a rental flat. They require an immediate replacement of a king-sized mattress. In-kind donation of 1 brand-new mattress will be appreciated. Family requires brand new mattress due to sensitive skin conditon. Thank you.

name: TV Console
description: A single-mother with a young child and facing financial difficulty needs a TV console to place the TV on. Otherwise, the TV will be placed on the floor.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Woodlands
contact.name: Ho Mee Chan

name: Laptop for Single-Mother for Upgrading Course
description: Single mother of 4 and 6yo child is seeking to improve herself through a 6 months course, such that she is able to seek out better employment to provide for her children. She requires a laptop to support her learning. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much

name: Wacom Intuos Tablet
description:
Young adult with mild ID is currently doing her part-time studies in digital animation at the ITE. She requires a tablet (Wacom Intuos) for her school work. 

Young adult is residing and taken care by her grandparents who are no longer working.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Laptop/Desktop
description:
Young adult with mild ID is currently doing her part-time studies in digital animation at the ITE. She requires a desktop/laptop for her school work.

Young adult is residing and taken care by her grandparents who are no longer working.

Min specifications required to support the necessary educational software:

Processor: Intel(R) Core (TM) i7-8550U CPU @ 1.80GHz 1.99 GHz
RAM: 16GB
System type: 64-bit operating system, x64-based processer
Software: Windows 10

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Laptop
description: Client is 70 years old and currently fostering 2 of her school going grand-nephews. Client would require an additional laptop as family currently only has 1 laptop, making it challenging for both children to attend HBL/online tuition at the same time. Appreciate it donors can bear delivery cost. Thank you!

name: Used laptop
description:
A son is serving his last stage of his sentence by participating a rehabilitation programme at a halfway house. His mother is currently staying at a nursing home since 2016 while the son was incarcerated for the sentence before this current sentence. His sister had been supporting the expenses of his mother while the son was imprisonment. 

The son wishes to have a used laptop for practicing the basic computer knowledge he learnt in the prison. He has a desire to upgrade himself by learning to access computer for his future career after completing the current sentence.

name: A used laptop
description: A father who is serving the last stage of a sentence works at a halfway house. He had recently completed a computer course for beginners. He wishes to have a used laptop for him to practice the knowledge he learnt from the computer lesson. He has two teenage schooling children. One child with Nephrotic Syndrome requires life long medication for his health. His wife works as a stall assistant with irregular income. His maternal grandmother is staying at a nursing home. His mother is unemployed with health issues.

name: Painting canvas A4 with frame (36x)
description: For low income families with children ages between 5 - 18 years old, for individual casework sessions with the children to do art creating and art therapy work. Requesting support in donations of painting canvas with frame (A4 Size). Donors can get in touch with me on delivering the painting canvas to our office at (20 Lengkok Bahru, Playground Block, #03-02, Singapore 159053). Thank you!

name: Home printer and computer microphone
description: M15 and his mom are on Comcare. His foreign mom is on LTVP and unemployed. M15 requests a home printer with computer microphone for his home based learning.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Christina Lim

name: Home printer and computer microphone
description: M15's mom is on LTVP and is unemployed. He requires a home printer and computer microphone for home based learning.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Christina Lim

name: Safety Shoes/Boots Needed!
description: Client is a single mother and the sole provider for her family. Client works as a cleaner and is mainly deployed to work in public areas such as the express highways,  roadsides etc. Due to the nature of her work and as her current pair is no longer usable, Client requires safety boots/shoes.
